entry.title: [SGP02][Cooling System] - Rack SGP0202E02B maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 23, 01:30 - 13:30 UTC

Nov 17, 10:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 23/12/2025 01:30 UTC
End time : 23/12/2025 13:30 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance. Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS4/5/6/7][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work rooms T04/T05/T06/B702/B703/B707/B709/B710/B716
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 9, 13:00 - 17:30 UTC

Nov 18, 05:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 09/12/2025 13:00 UTC
End time : 09/12/2025 17:30 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the specified rooms may be unreachable during the maintenance window.
Please note that maintenance will take place during the following time slots :
BHS4 (T04A/T04B/T04C) : 13:00 UTC to 13:45 UTC
BHS5 (All rows in the room) : 13:45 UTC to 15:00 UTC
BHS6 (All rows in the room) : 15:00 UTC to 15:45 UTC
BHS7 (B702/B703/B707/B709/B710/B716) : 15:45 UTC to 17:30 UTC
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work.

Thank you for your understanding.
